   19: 
   20: -module(et_wx_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   23:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   24:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   25: -export([start_all_windows/1]).
   26: 
   27: -include("et_test_lib.hrl").
   28: 
   29: %% Initialization functions.
   30: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   31:     et_test_lib:wx_init_per_suite(Config).
   32: 
   33: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   34:     et_test_lib:wx_end_per_suite(Config).
   35: 
   36: init_per_testcase(Func,Config) ->
   37:     et_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func,Config).
   38: end_per_testcase(Func,Config) -> 
   39:     et_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func,Config).
   40: 
   41: %% SUITE specification
   42: 
   43: suite() ->
   44:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   45: 
   46: all() -> 
   47:     [start_all_windows].
   48: 
   49: %% The test cases
   50: 
   51: %% Display all windows and see if something crashes
   52: start_all_windows(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) ->
   53:     et_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
   54: start_all_windows(_Config) ->
   55:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
   56:     {ok, ViewerPid} = ?msym({ok, _}, et_viewer:start_link([])),
   57:     CollectorPid = et_viewer:get_collector_pid(ViewerPid),      
   58:     ?msym({ok, _}, et_collector:report_event(CollectorPid,
   59: 					     60,
   60: 					     some_from_actor,
   61: 					     some_to_actor,
   62: 					     some_label, 
   63: 					     "Some details")),
   64:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
   65: 
   66:     {ok, EventPid1} = ?msym({ok, _}, et_viewer:open_event(ViewerPid, 1)),
   67:     {ok, EventPid2} = ?msym({ok, _}, et_viewer:open_event(ViewerPid, 1)),
   68:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(10)),
   69: 
   70:     ?msym(alive, process_state(ViewerPid)),
   71:     ?msym(alive, process_state(CollectorPid)),
   72:     ?msym(alive, process_state(EventPid1)),
   73:     ?msym(alive, process_state(EventPid2)),
   74: 
   75:     ?m(ok, et_wx_contents_viewer:stop(EventPid1)),
   76:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
   77: 
   78:     ?msym(alive, process_state(ViewerPid)),
   79:     ?msym(alive, process_state(CollectorPid)),
   80:     ?msym(dead,  process_state(EventPid1)),
   81:     ?msym(alive, process_state(EventPid2)),
   82: 
   83:     ?m(ok, et_viewer:stop(ViewerPid)),
   84:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
   85: 
   86:     ?msym(dead, process_state(ViewerPid)),
   87:     ?msym(dead, process_state(CollectorPid)),
   88:     ?msym(dead, process_state(EventPid1)),
   89:     ?msym(dead, process_state(EventPid2)),
   90: 
   91:     ?m([], et_test_lib:flush()),
   92: 
   93:     ok.
   94: 
   95: process_state(Pid) ->
   96:     case process_info(Pid, group_leader) of
   97: 	{group_leader, _} -> alive;
   98: 	undefined         -> dead
   99:     end.
